body: Just a dark green imprint that says VETERAN in front of their name for McZone vetrans.
body_tagged: Just a dark green imprint that says VETERAN in front of their name for McZone vetrans.
title: Veteran Rank

replies.body:
No.

It's just for people to brag about joining the server before some other people.
replies.body_tagged:
No.

replies.body: Don't really see the need in this :c
replies.body_tagged: Don't really see the need in this :c

replies.body:
Sorry but I don't like this idea.
Also, how would it work if the person is a Gold rank (for example) and they are also a veteran? How will that show up?
replies.body_tagged:
Sorry but I don't like this idea.

replies.body: There already is "Veteran" rank, it is for people who get 5th prestige in every game mode.

You can be a vet by having 5'th prestige in every gamemode as D00ZiE stated above.
